events.text: A pig is sick.  You could put it down peacefully or send it off for a little bit of money.  The city wont be very happy eating a sick pig, but some money will be had!

options.optiontext: Put the Pig down silently. (-1 Pig)
Sell the pig for half cost in the city. (-1 Pig, +20 Gold, -5 City Love)

events.text: The army is on the march and is in desperate need of food.  Your favor with the king would increase highly, but you would get a lower then average cost for the pigs.
